job_description:
• As a team leader you will provide mentorship and career development, identify team strengths and weaknesses and create specific development plans with team members, conduct performance appraisals, provide recognition and drive accountability across the team Demonstrated ability to solve problems across multi-functional groups, both within and outside the department Strong software skills using, Python, C, C++, Verilog, and Linux scripting skills (Bash/Tcl) Experience delegating tasks and setting priorities in a team environment a plus Experience working with multi-functional teams across multiple sites a plus Solid interpersonal skills and a track record as a strong collaborator Bachelor’s or Master's Degree in Electrical or Computer Engineering.
• 10+ years of relevant technical experience to include the following: Experience in high speed and high performance systems architectures Design, Verification or Product Engineering experience.
